name: Evil Group Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner villain with our Evil Group Name Generator! Find the perfect moniker for your dastardly crew, guaranteed to strike fear and inspire awe (mostly fear).
introduction: So, you're starting an evil group? Excellent choice! World domination, elaborate heists, and general mayhem await. But first, you need a name. Something that screams 'We're up to no good!' Our Evil Group Name Generator is here to help you craft the perfect title for your nefarious organization. Forget 'Team Awesome'; we're talking 'Legion of Doom' level stuff.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and BAM! A deliciously evil name appears.
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! We've got more evil names than you can shake a stick of dynamite at.
Found the perfect name? Copy it and start plotting your world takeover! (Or, you know, just use it for your D&D campaign.)

faqs.question: Is this generator actually evil?
faqs.answer: Only in the most delightful, fictional way. We're not responsible for any actual acts of villainy inspired by our names.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my band?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Evil band names are the best band names. Just don't blame us when you accidentally summon a demon on stage.

faqs.question: Are the generated names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! Feel free to use them as you wish. Though, if someone else comes up with the same name independently, that's just cosmic coincidence (or, you know, convergent evil thinking).

faqs.question: What if I need a name that's *really* evil?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! Or, get creative and mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique brand of wickedness.

faqs.question: Will using one of these names make me a better villain?
faqs.answer: A great name is a good start. The rest is up to you! Sharpen your evil laugh, perfect your monologues, and remember to always have a backup plan.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to make our generator even more evil! Send your suggestions our way. We'll consider them... menacingly.
